verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \w perceived|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w longed|strong="H3820"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Absalom.

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w Tekoa|strong="H8620"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* told \w her|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* pretend \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mourner; \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w clothes|strong="H3847"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* mourning \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w do|strong="H4994"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w anoint|strong="H5480"\w* \w yourself|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*. \w Act|strong="H4994"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* \w who|strong="H7227"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* mourned \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w go|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w*.” \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* woman \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tekoa|strong="H8621"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* facedown \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w homage|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* said, “\w Help|strong="H3467"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*!”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* troubles \w you|strong="H4100"\w*?” \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w her|strong="H4191"\w*. “Indeed,” \w she|strong="H4100"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H4100"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* widow, \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H4191"\w* husband \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5221"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w fighting|strong="H5327"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w with|strong="H4191"\w* no \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w separate|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w has|strong="H1571"\w* \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* said, ‘\w Hand|strong="H5414"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brother, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* brother \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* cut \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heir|strong="H3423"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*!’ \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* \w extinguish|strong="H3518"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w remaining|strong="H7604"\w* ember \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* preserving \w my|strong="H5414"\w* husband’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w or|strong="H1571"\w* \w posterity|strong="H7611"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.”

“\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*,” \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w*, “\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w orders|strong="H6680"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w behalf|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Tekoa|strong="H8621"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w My|strong="H5921"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w may|strong="H4428"\w* any \w blame|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w guiltless|strong="H5355"\w*.”

“If anyone \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*,” \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5060"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w bring|strong="H5060"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* trouble \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*!”

“\w Please|strong="H4994"\w*,” \w she|strong="H3808"\w* replied, “\w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w invoke|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* prevent \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w avenger|strong="H1350"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* increasing \w the|strong="H3068"\w* devastation, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*!” “\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H5307"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3068"\w* vowed, “\w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hair|strong="H8185"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w head|strong="H5307"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ground.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* woman \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* lord \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?” “\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*,” \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w like|strong="H2803"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God? \w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w says|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w does|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* convict himself, since \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w banished|strong="H5080"\w* son?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w like|strong="H2803"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w poured|strong="H5064"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w on|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ground, \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* recovered. \w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w devises|strong="H2803"\w* \w ways|strong="H4284"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w banished|strong="H5080"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w cast|strong="H4325"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Him|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w present|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. \w Your|strong="H6213"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w thought|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w Perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w grant|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w request|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* maidservant \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w would|strong="H3162"\w* cut \w off|strong="H5337"\w* \w both|strong="H3162"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* God’s \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w says|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘\w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w bring|strong="H7451"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* able \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w discern|strong="H8085"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w just|strong="H1697"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* woman, “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* am going \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w something|strong="H1697"\w*; \w do|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w conceal|strong="H3582"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*!” “\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* lord \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*,” she \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* behind \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*?” \w The|strong="H3605"\w* woman \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* \w turn|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3231"\w* \w or|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H8041"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w says|strong="H1696"\w*. \w Yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w gave|strong="H6680"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w orders|strong="H6680"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w* \w exactly|strong="H6680"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w has|strong="H5650"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w change|strong="H5437"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w affairs|strong="H1697"\w*, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w has|strong="H5650"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w like|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w God|strong="H2451"\w*, \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w happens|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* hereby \w grant|strong="H2009"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w request|strong="H1697"\w*. \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* Absalom.”
